text: Mari Reitalu (born February 10, 1941) is an Estonian botanist. She was a recipient of the Eerik Kumari Award in 1993. ==References== Category:1941 births Category:Living people Category:Estonian botanists Category:Estonian women scientists Category:Women botanists Category:20th-century women scientists Category:20th-century botanists Category:21st-century women scientists Category:21st-century botanists Category:Recipients of the Order of the White Star, 4th Class
title: Mari Reitalu
